metadata.title: CVE-2022-48670 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:peci: cpu: Fix use-after-free in adev_release()When auxiliary_device_add() returns an error, auxiliary_device_uninit()is called, which causes refcount for device to be decremented and.release callback will be triggered.Because adev_release() re-calls auxiliary_device_uninit(), it will causeuse-after-free:[ 1269.455172] WARNING: CPU: 0 PID: 14267 at lib/refcount.c:28refcount_warn_saturate+0x110/0x15[ 1269.464007] refcount_t: underflow; use-after-free.

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support').
linux-laptop package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lowlatency package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-oracle package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-raspi package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-starfive package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
